# General purpose and scope

The overarching objective of the Data Reporting Guidelines (DRGs) is to provide a set of rules and best practices to the staff responsible for the collection and reporting of fisheries and biological data to the IOTC Secretariat according to the IOTC Conservation and Management Measures ([CMMs]()). This version of the DRGs is based on the [CMMs](https://iotc.org/cmms) in place as of the 1^st^ of July 2024. The DRGs are addressed to all (CPCs) and any other parties that fish in the IOTC area of competence for species managed by the IOTC.
